articles.author: Elon Musk
articles.description:
Use of free authentication apps for 2FA will remain free and are much more secure than SMS

Twitter Support:â€‚Effective March 20, 2023, only Twitter Blue subscribers will be able to use text messages as their two-factor authentication method. Other accounts can use an authentication app or security key for 2FA. Learn more here:
â€‚https://blog.twitter.com/en_us/topics/product/2023/an-update-on-two-factor-authentication-using-sms-on-twitter
